column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a California girl one of the first things I wanted to do in Chicago was eat some famous deep dish pizza. With the help of my boyfriend we compounded a list of places based on reviews and suggestions from friends and family. We narrowed it down to Lou Malnati's
column2: Giordano's and Pizano's I believe. Â Out of all three places Lou's hands down took the cake! What made it better was overall taste
column3: the butter crust was insanely delicious and the toppings were so balanced. Service was also great
column4: it was the only place where you could preorder the pizza while waiting for your table. Since each pizza takes 30-45 minutes to bake the preorder while you wait is genius for the hungry customer. Overall would highly recommend!
